name: JVC KD-SX27BT Car Stereo with Bluetooth, 100W Digital Media Receiver, 1.5A USB to Charge Devices, Single DIN Head Unit, AM/FM, Aux-in, JVC Remote App
short_description: WIRELESS DIGITAL MEDIA RECEIVER: JVC KD-SX27BT Car Stereo Receiver integrates easily into a wide range of vehicles and lets you stream music from popular music apps like Pandora & Spotify wirelessly via Bluetooth, or play stored tracks on your device

POWERFUL CAR AUDIO: With a built-in 100W amplifier (50W/channel), this single DIN car stereo uses K2 technology & a 13-band EQ for detailed sound. Time Alignment ensures sound reaches your ears at the same time & Sound Lift enhances audio positioning

BLUETOOTH CAR STEREO WITH UNLIMITED STREAMING: Connect 2 phones full-time (with hands-free calling) & up to 5 BT devices simultaneously. Play music via AM/FM, USB, AUX-In or connect an additional amplifier or sub with the preamp-out for on-the-go fun

FAST CHARGING AND AUDIO PLAYBACK: The USB 1.5A port quickly charges your devices on the go, so you’re always powered up during long drives or adventures, this receiver supports MP3, WMA, WAV, AAC, and high-res FLAC files for ultimate audio experience

ADDITIONAL SMART FEATURES: Control the receiver directly using the "JVC Remote" app for iOS/Android, enjoy Spanish text display compatibility for added convenience, and benefit from a short chassis design that reduces weight & simplifies installation
A BRAND YOU CAN TRUST - All products have a 1-year warranty

short_description: Bluetooth Connectivity - With built-in Bluetooth technology, connect your smartphone wirelessly. This allows for convenient hands-free calling, enabling you to make and receive phone calls while keeping your hands on the wheel and eyes on the road.

USB Input - Receiver is equipped with a USB port for easy connection to your portable devices, including smartphones, MP3 players, or USB drives. Play music directly from the device or charge it on the go.

Media Playback - Car stereo supports an array of file formats such as MP3, WMA, AAC, and WAV, ensuring compatibility with your entire digital music library. Enjoy seamless connectivity with USB inputs and experience crisp, high-quality audio.

Advanced Sound Retriever - Immerse yourself in enhanced audio quality with the Advanced Sound Retriever feature. Innovative technology intelligently restores audio details lost during compression, resulting in clearer, more dynamic sound reproduction.

With USB and auxiliary inputs you can effortlessly connect your mobile devices, MP3 players, or USB drives to enjoy your entire music library in MP3, WMA, AAC, or WAV formats. Immerse yourself in high-quality sound with Advanced Sound Retriever technology, restoring audio details lost during compression for clearer, dynamic playback and enhanced audio quality. Easily install this single-din, mechless head unit in a wide variety of applications with it's shallow depth of less than 4 inches. Transform your journey with the Pioneer MVH-S230BT today for enhanced convenience and entertainment on the road.

name: 7" Double Din Car Stereo with Wireless Apple Carplay & Android Auto, Bluetooth, 240W, SWC, Subwoofer Out, Mirror Link, USB-C/AUX/TF, FM/AM Car Radio Receiver, Backup Camera
short_description: 【Wireless & Wired Carplay / Android Auto with Voice Control】 This double din car stereo supports both wireless and wired apple carplay & Android Auto. Your phone connects automatically when the car starts. Use voice commands via Siri or Google Assistant for hands-free navigation, calls, messages, and music—keeping you focused on the road while enjoying smart connectivity.

【Hi-Fi Sound with DSP & Subwoofer Output】 Built-in DSP processor and 4.1-channel (240W max) deliver crystal-clear audio with rich bass. Use the 10-band EQ to customize your sound. One subwoofer RCA outputs support powerful bass setups, while the large rear heat sink prevents overheating for long, stable playback.

【Bluetooth + Dual Microphones】 Features a dedicated Bluetooth chip for faster pairing and stable streaming. Comes with a built-in mic and external mic port to ensure clear voice pickup, even at highway speeds—ideal for hands-free calling and voice commands without background noise.

【7" IPS Touchscreen + Mirror Link + Dual Camera Support】 Enjoy sharp visuals on the 7-inch IPS display (1024x600) with wide viewing angles and responsive touch. Wired Mirror Link (for Android & iOS) mirrors your phone screen for video, apps, and maps. Supports both rear and front cameras (8-LED rear camera included, front camera not included) with auto-switching in reverse for safer parking.The cable for this camera is 19.7ft. If you need a longer cable, you need to buy an extension cord.

【Steering Wheel Control & Easy Installation】 Supports steering wheel button functions like volume and track change via compatible interface module. Use the existing functions on your steering wheel (interface module sold separately. We recommend the PAC SWI-CP2). Fits most standard double din dash openings. Some vehicles may require a dash kit, wiring adapter, or antenna adapter (not included). 24/7 tech support available—responses within 24 hours.

Use navigation apps like Google Maps and Waze, your contacts, messages, and music libraries effortlessly through the intuitive 5.7-inch display or voice commands.
